text: The Dirty Dozen is a 1967 war movie starring Lee Marvin and featuring an ensemble supporting cast including Ernest Borgnine, Charles Bronson, Jim Brown, John Cassavetes, George Kennedy, Robert Ryan, Telly Savalas, Robert Webber and Donald Sutherland with Trini Lopez. It was directed by Robert Aldrich. The screenplay is based on the 1965 bestseller by E. M. Nathanson. ==References== Category:1967 war movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Aldrich
title: The Dirty Dozen
